Description: Necklace of glazed pottery beads, grey and white, in bands, with a tassel attached by brass wire.
Curator's comments: Recorded in the acquisition register as modern Egyptian work, collected about 1920.
Acquisition notes: Af1965,11.1 and 2 are recorded as the gift of Mrs Esther Ciapetti of Wilmslow (the name might alternatively be read as Ciapelli).
